Published Applications.label: Launcher Ops
Published Applications.description: Manage and Benchmark your favorite launchers in Android. Detect anomalies, permission usages and clones that could potentially ruin your android homescreen experience. This app is built with ONE UI.

Published Applications.label: Launchers Quick Tile
Published Applications.description: Swap launcher homescreens from your statusbar quicktile section. Supports up to Android 12 because of deprecation issues.

Published Applications.label: Launchers Quick Tile 2
Published Applications.description: Swap launcher homescreens from your statusbar quicktile section. Supports Android 13 and above with improvements from the prequel app.

Published Applications.label: Truesight (Preview)
Published Applications.description: My attempt at building a mobile version of steam charts. This app pulls data from steams public apis to allow users to chart their own matrix of game populations. I've also added in a few things of my own that gamers will appreciate.

Published Applications.label: Carpentar
Published Applications.description: An Icon Pack Manager that allows you to benchmark the compatibility of launcher apps, extract icons and resources as well as craft your own icons! This app is built with ONE UI.

Libraries.label: Unnoficial Google Play API for Android
Libraries.description: Java library for android that builds of a rest api by Rajkumar. Pulls publisher info for a selected app off of Google Play.

Libraries.label: Expandable Preference Group
Libraries.description: A custom preference group for android that expands on click to show preferences held inside the group and can condense them for a cleaner UI.

Libraries.label: Fluent Popup Menu
Libraries.description: A custom widget for android that acts as a context menu for objects and views. The menu will appear above the object, with or without an arrow, and you can use the prebuilt menu or add in a custom view. Code is currently being optimized for release for the public.

Libraries.label: Expandable Preference Group
Libraries.description: A custom preference group for android that expands on click to show preferences held inside the group and can condense them for a cleaner UI.

Libraries.label: SwitchBar
Libraries.description: A custom widget inspired by ONE UI for AOSP. Hasn't been updated in awhile...

Experimental or Deprecated.label: Sapphire Launcher
Experimental or Deprecated.description: My first custom launcher based on AOSP by Slim Roms. It was launched in 2015 and later unpublished to be upgraded with a pixal launcher clone.

Experimental or Deprecated.label: Sapphyx Launcher
Experimental or Deprecated.description: Launched in 2017, Sapphyx Launcher was my first launched that was based on Google Pixel Launcher port to the public and offered an array of cool new features and customization. This project had taught me that it was becoming really difficult to based projects on another source and we should start look at build from the ground up.

Experimental or Deprecated.label: GCA Launcher
Experimental or Deprecated.description: Gocal's Custom Android Launcher. Launched in late 2018, retired in 2021 for deprecation reasons. Currently in the works to make a full return and revamped for the newest sdk. Launchers are alot of work to maintain so when you start other projects, they will fall behind.

Experimental or Deprecated.label: Drosera Launcher
Experimental or Deprecated.description: My own take on a custom android launcher designed for handhelds and personal desktop environments. This project has been active for the last 2 years and unfortunately with public previews, the feedsback has fallen short. We will continue to tackly this project until its done right.
